entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
